div.p: ( a) Shows the temporal spectrum of the global-mean TSI, ( b) the temporal spectrum of gST, ( c) the temporal spectrum of the global-mean OLR and ( d) the temporal spectrum of the global-mean precipitation of the simulation with a semimajor axis of the planetary orbit around Kepler-35 AB of 1.165â€‰a.u. The horizontal axes denote the period in days and O B indicates the period of the binary orbit as seen from the planet and O P the period of the planetary orbit. The temporal spectrum was taken over 10,800 Earth-days in steady state.
